text: John Ernest Miller (May 30, 1941 â€“ June 5, 2020) was an American professional baseball player. He played in all or part of five seasons in Major League Baseball for the Baltimore Orioles between 1962 through 1967. He was born in Baltimore, Maryland. Miller died on June 5, 2020 at the age of 79. ==References== Category:1941 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Baltimore Orioles players Category:Sportspeople from Baltimore
title: John Miller (pitcher)
